description: Schema for storing case-control study data
title: CaseControl

___scores.description: List of score assigned to case control study. Limited to one per user.
___scores.title: Scores

___affiliation.description: The affiliation this evidence is associated with.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___explanationForGeneticAncestryNotMatch.description: Explanation for selecting type of genetic ancestry
___explanationForGeneticAncestryNotMatch.title: Explanation

___explanationForDiseaseHistoryEvaluatio.description: Explanation for selecting type of disease evaluation
___explanationForDiseaseHistoryEvaluatio.title: Explanation

___explanationForDemographicMatched.description: Explanation for selecting type of demographic info
___explanationForDemographicMatched.title: Explanation

___geneticAncestryMatched.description: Whether case and control cohorts are matched for genetic ancestry?
___geneticAncestryMatched.title: Genetic Ancestry Matched

___diseaseHistoryEvaluated.description: Whether primary disease and/or family history of disease are evaluated?
___diseaseHistoryEvaluated.title: Primary Disease Evaluated

___differInVariables.description: Whether case and control cohorts differ in any other variables?
___differInVariables.title: Differ In Other Variables

___demographicInfoMatched.description: Whether case and control cohorts are mateched by demogtaphic information?
___demographicInfoMatched.title: Demographic Info Matched
